Trigger.Name: Dynamo Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: O hallowed moon, shine you the iron path

Trigger.Name: Dynamo Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my foes

Trigger.Name: Meteor Stream Divebomb
Trigger.RegularExpression: Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, exalt you the red moon

Trigger.Name: Divebomb Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, scorch you the earth

Trigger.Name: Jump Dynamo
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, the hallowed moon to call

Trigger.Name: Jump Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, the iron path to walk

Trigger.Name: Beam Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: Blazing path, lead me to iron rule

Trigger.Name: Doom call
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[a-zA-Z' ]+) gains the effect of Doom from for (?<time>\d+)
